extendedInfo.description: DescriptionIntroducing the Buzztime Mobile Playmaker, an App that allows you to play along with Buzztimeâs Trivia, Sports and Card games from your Android device at any of our 3,900+ locations in North America. The Buzztime Mobile Playmaker offers fans an alternative to our traditional game console (aka the Playmaker) and offers added features such as a Buzztime location finder, making sure you always know where the action is, no matter where you are! Download our FREE Mobile Playmaker App now!Buzztime Mobile Playmaker version 1.6.3------------------------------Play along with fellow Trivia and Cards junkies in any North American Buzztime location. Register, LogIn, Play! It's that simple. Put Buzztime in your pocket!Features:Play along with fellow Trivia, Sports and Card junkies in any North American Buzztime location. Log in, select your location, choose a game, and play! It's that simple. Put Buzztime in your pocket!Features:â¢ Connect to Buzztime: Register or log in with your existing Buzztime Username and Password.â¢ Find Buzztime locations near you: The Buzztime Mobile Playmaker uses your GPS location to provide you a list of the nearest Buzztime locations. Simply select the location that youâre in, or check out other locations in the neighborhood!â¢ Play Buzztime: Select from the Buzztime games airing at the location youâre in, and play along with the rest of the Buzztime community, locally and nationally!Important Notes:------------**The GPS Location Services are a necessary component of our application that must be present at all times and this app will not work on devices without GPS or where the GPS has been turned off***The Buzztime Mobile Playmaker App is designed to be used in conjunction with the TVâs at your favorite Buzztime location as an alternative to our traditional Playmaker boxes.Game play begins at 11 a.m. local time. You may not be able to log in to your location, or may get an error message stating that no games are available, if you try to connect prior to 11 a.m.If, for any reason, you cannot connect after a few tries, please restart the App. Reconnecting will help ensure a good connection. Buzztime is not responsible for connections. Connection issues can be affected for many reasons, including the device you utilize, the type of building you are in, your proximity to a cell tower, and more.The first version of the Mobile Playmaker does not support the following games: Sports IQ, Race Day

reviews.title: This app used to rock. Now it SUCKS
reviews.comment: I don\'t know what happened in the last 6 months, but this app went from hero to zero. Constantly resetting at the most inopportune times. WTF?
reviews.author: Brian Charlton

reviews.title: Disconnects constantly, even on wifi
reviews.comment: Like everyone else says, it disconnects/times out, can\'t rejoin...
reviews.author: Matt Sloper

reviews.title: This app freezes
reviews.comment: This app freezes a lot. Sux balls How am I supposed to win at poker if it keeps freezing and making me fold?
reviews.author: Steven Likens

reviews.title: This app sucks so bad!
reviews.comment: It will let you answer 2-3 questions, then stops working. Already uninstalled and re-installed, and nothing. Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Connection?
reviews.comment: Can never get the sure list to come up.  Sad. Droid charge.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy update
reviews.comment: Kept folding during poker and occasionally game play would just freeze and I\'d have to keep logging in to play. (SGS2)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrating and maddening
reviews.comment: Keeps disconnecting while in game.
reviews.author: Sam Conley

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: Worked good for a few rounds until it randomly stopped letting me choose answers. Still better than the actual playmakers though.
reviews.author: Allie Perry

reviews.title: Serious connection issues
reviews.comment: I was like you.  I read the reviews before downloading this app thinking maybe my phone was superior and would be able to run this app.  Boy was I wrong.  This app is useless
reviews.author: Sean Tucker

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: My cards never show up in blackjack or poker and its super buggy.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Noah L.

reviews.title: Love,
reviews.comment: The games!
reviews.author: Janny Tan

reviews.title: Dumb.
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time meow.
reviews.author: Joshua Tucker

reviews.title: Need to be able to find location without gps
reviews.comment: I am in a buffalo wild wings where there is no gps coverage within the restaurant, and thus, I can\'t log in to play the game. This is a flaw that needs to be fixed. Every other location based app gives you the option to find your location in case you don\'t have line of site to get gps. This should have been a no brainer to the app developers!
reviews.author: Mark W Johnson

reviews.comment: Always resets my pot... Often folds my hand.
reviews.author: Alan Peake

reviews.title: Letting me down
reviews.comment: Worked wonderfully but is letting me down the last few days. It won\'t connect when I\'m trying to answer questions and I\'m losing points. Bummer. So much nicer using the app than the playmaker, but I\'ll go with the playmaker and get my points.
reviews.author: Heidi A. Coghlan

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: I love the Buzztime app!  It makes playing the game easy, is portable and has a great user interface.  Buzztime games are awesome!!
reviews.author: Jenna Zdanowski

reviews.title: App still sucks
reviews.comment: You would think someone could put a little more effort in an app to make it work better. Been using it for a while but no such luck on improvement from developer just keeps freezing on hold em you guys suck
reviews.author: Ryan Bourlon

reviews.title: What?
reviews.comment: All the app does is allow you to push the number ti the corresponding answer? You have to actually be in a spot for trivia, as I was hoping to play just from my phone. You can\'t see the question if not in playmaker promoting bar but you can play poker all day. I get from a business sense why it would be attractive for us to sit in thei estanlishment all day if we choose but expensive. Really don\'t see the point of this app otherwise
reviews.author: Thomas Eglip Jr

reviews.title: Fatal flaw
reviews.comment: If your phone switches from wifi to 3g it will log you out and you will lose ....update July 25, still sucks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but could be better!
reviews.comment: Good app, loses connection every once in a while.  Would be a great app if it showed the questions on your mobile device as well.  Please add the ability to show questions on your phone, then it would be the best app available.
reviews.author: tiltrotor22 .
